p: At baseline, 28.6% and 17.4% of the participants in the DWL and BWL, respectively, were above the clinical depression cutoff of 16 on the CES‐D. At day 7 post‐transplant, about 40% of participants in both groups scored above the clinical cutoff. However, at the third day of engraftment, 68.4% of participants in the DWL group scored above the clinical cutoff compared to 42.1% of the participants in the BWL group.
